title: Can't login to support to see My Tickets..
body:
Every time I visit the page and click "My Tickets" it redirects me to the login page, so I login again, then the page redirects and says it's logging me out. It's 2016 and we can't figure how to keep persistent connections across sessions yet despite having the "Remember Me" option enabled Riot?

Can't wait for Riot to address this issue so that I may get the assistance I need, I'll be eagerly awaiting a reply in this wasteland of reported issues with no resolutions.

http://imgur.com/a/FgyAA

replies.body: Could you try clearing your browser cache?

I tried clearing cookies/cache and I'm getting the same issue. Login > redirected to "You are being logged out" > redirected to this page https://login.support.riotgames.com/error?error_code=CLIENT_ERROR&selected_locale=en-us

I had accidentally purchased a champion with RP instead of IP and was told if I earned enough IP they will refund the RP and use the IP instead. Is this something I can just pick back up with any old support person? I feel as though emailing support is just going to delay things even further. Too many cooks spoil the pot, ya'know? I don't want to have to spend 72 hours just verifying information via email when the support site should be working.

Unfortunately I can't remember any other advice to fixing this issue beyond contacting support (through [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) or the email Porocles suggested), but you could try using a different browser as well as a potential workaround.

As for handling the ticket, ask them to refer to your other ticket so they can see this was offered to you. They're more likely to grant the request if they see another member promised it.

There may be an issue with your browser settings or the captcha that's not verifying login properly.  DTN suggested[ clearing your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies#wq1) which could resolve this, or running Incognito.  If you're still having issues, you can also submit a ticket to us by sending an email to support@riotgames.com.  Hope that helps!
